mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (seq_member, imageFileName, imageOriginalFileName, name, imageSubject, imageContent) VALUES (#{seq_member}, #{imageFileName}, #{imageOriginalFileName}, #{name}, #{imageSubject}, #{imageContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE imageSubject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR imageContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY seq_board DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
